love_quotes.english: A true relationship is with someone who accepts your past, supports your present and encourages your future.
love_quotes.chinese: 真正愛你的人，會接受你的過去、支持你的現在，還會鼓勵你去擁有美好的未來。

love_quotes.english: Anyone can make you smile. Many people can make you cry. But it takes someone really special to make you smile with tears in your eyes.
love_quotes.chinese: 誰都能讓你笑，也有很多人能讓你哭，但只有那個特別的人，能讓你在眼中含淚的時候，依然能笑得出來。

love_quotes.english: Happiness is a drug. And I want to be your dealer.
love_quotes.chinese: 快樂是一種毒品，而我想當你的毒販。

love_quotes.english: I can't promise to fix all your problems, but I can promise you won't have to face them all alone.
love_quotes.chinese: 我無法承諾幫你解決所有的問題，但我保證不會讓你獨自去面對。

love_quotes.english: I don't need someone who is perfect. I need someone who loves me, respects me, cares for me and understands me.
love_quotes.chinese: 我不需要一個完美的對象，我只需要一個疼愛我、尊重我、照顧我和理解我的人。

love_quotes.english: I love you for all that you are, all that you have been, and all you're yet to be.
love_quotes.chinese: 我愛你的全部，包含當下、曾經以及未來的你。

love_quotes.english: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
love_quotes.chinese: 我愛你，不是因為你是一個怎樣的人，而是因為與你在一起時，我變成了怎樣的自己。

love_quotes.english: I love you not for who you are, but for who I am with you.
love_quotes.chinese: 我愛你不是因為你是誰，而是我在你面前可以是誰。

love_quotes.english: If I could give you one thing in life, I would give you the ability to see yourself through my eyes, only then would you realize how special you are to me.
love_quotes.chinese: 如果我能夠在此生中給你一樣東西，我想要給你一種能力，讓你能透過我的雙眼看見你自己，唯有如此你才能了解你對我來說有多麼地特別。

love_quotes.english: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put Y and I together.
love_quotes.chinese: 如果我能重新排列英文字母，我要把 Y（你）跟 I（我）排在一起。

love_quotes.english: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
love_quotes.chinese: 若我能理解愛情為何物，那就是因為你。

love_quotes.english: If someone truly loves you, they won't tell you love stories, they will make a love story with you.
love_quotes.chinese: 如果一個人真的愛你，他不會和你訴說愛情故事，而是會和你一起創造。

love_quotes.english: It's not about trying to find the perfect relationship; it's just about loving someone imperfect, perfectly.
love_quotes.chinese: 並非要試著去找到最完美的關係，而是要徹底地去愛一個不完美的人。

love_quotes.english: It's not being in love that makes me happy. It is the person that I am in love with that does.
love_quotes.chinese: 讓我幸福的不是戀情本身，而是讓我深陷戀情的人。

love_quotes.english: Love can never be taught for it is to be learned; love can never be bought for it is to be given; love can never be kept for it is to be free; love can never be old for it lives to last a lifetime.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛可以學會，而無法教會；愛能夠給予，而無法買到；愛是自由的，而無法佔有；愛持續一生，而永不凋零。

love_quotes.english: Love creates an 'us' without destroying a 'me'.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛情創造了「我們」，卻不會讓「我」隨之毀滅。

love_quotes.english: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛情並非由凝視彼此建構而成，而是一起看向同一個方向前進。

love_quotes.english: Love is a combination of respect, friendship, understanding, communication and companionship.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛是由尊重、友誼、理解、溝通和陪伴所組合而成的。

love_quotes.english: Love is a magical drug; it cures both the ones who give it and those who receive it.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛是一種神奇的藥，它能療癒愛的給予者與接收者。

love_quotes.english: Love is just a word until you find someone who gives it the definition.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛只會是一個文字，直到你找到那個能賦予它意義的人。

love_quotes.english: Love is not a matter of counting the days. It's making the days count.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛情不是數著日子過去，它能讓每個日子變得有意義。

love_quotes.english: Love is not getting but giving.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛是付出，不是占有。

love_quotes.english: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
love_quotes.chinese: 當另一個人的幸福是你幸福的根本所在，那就是愛。

love_quotes.english: Love is the only word to describe what we've been through together.
love_quotes.chinese: 能夠描述我們一起經歷過的種種，唯有愛這個字。

love_quotes.english: Love isn't about who you envision spending the rest of your life with; it's about who you imagine being unable to live a life without.
love_quotes.chinese: 愛不是想像要和誰共度一生，而是無法想像生命中少了誰。

love_quotes.english: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you was beyond my control.
love_quotes.chinese: 遇見你是命運的安排，成為朋友是我的選擇，而愛上你是我情不自禁。

love_quotes.english: Missing you is my hobby, caring for you is my job, making you happy is my duty and loving you is my life.
love_quotes.chinese: 想念你是我的興趣，照顧你是我的工作，讓你開心是我的責任，疼愛你則是我的人生。

love_quotes.english: My dream wouldn't be complete without you in it.
love_quotes.chinese: 我的夢想沒有你就不會完整了。

love_quotes.english: No words are necessary between two loving hearts.
love_quotes.chinese: 兩顆相愛的心之間不需要言語。

love_quotes.english: One day, we will never have to say goodbye, only goodnight.
love_quotes.chinese: 終有一天，我們不再是說再見，而是互道晚安。

love_quotes.english: One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is love.
love_quotes.chinese: 有一個字可以讓我們擺脫生活中所有的重擔和痛苦，那就是愛。

love_quotes.english: Some people search their whole lives to find what I found in you.
love_quotes.chinese: 有些人用盡一生找尋我在你身上找到的答案。

love_quotes.english: Someone who really loves you sees what a mess you can be, how moody you can get, how hard you are to handle, but still wants you in their life.
love_quotes.chinese: 真愛就是即使見識過你的各種亂七八糟、各種情緒化、各種難搞，卻還是想要把你留在他的生命裡。

love_quotes.english: The words "I love you" take two seconds to say, two hours to explain and a lifetime to prove.
love_quotes.chinese: 「我愛你」這三個字要花兩秒去說、兩小時去解釋、一輩子去證明。

love_quotes.english: There are only two times that I want to be with you — now and forever.
love_quotes.chinese: 只有兩個時間我會想和你在一起——現在以及永遠。

love_quotes.english: There's a reason why two people stay together, they give each other something nobody else can.
love_quotes.chinese: 兩個人會在一起總是有原因的，他們給了彼此别人給不了的東西。

love_quotes.english: Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive.
love_quotes.chinese: 想到你會讓我睡不著，夢見你會讓我睡得熟，和你在一起會讓我生命旺盛。

love_quotes.english: To love without condition, to talk without intention, to give without reason, to care without expectation; that's the spirit of true love.
love_quotes.chinese: 沒有條件地去喜愛、沒有意圖地去交談、沒有原因地去付出、沒有期待地去照顧，這就是真愛的精神。

love_quotes.english: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you are the world.
love_quotes.chinese: 對這個世界而言，你也許只是一個人；但對某個人而言，你卻是全世界。

love_quotes.english: True love is when you value your lover's happiness more than yours, and make their happiness your first priority.
love_quotes.chinese: 當你把愛人的幸福看得比自己的還重要，並當成第一順位，那就是真愛。

love_quotes.english: We fall in love by chance, but we stay in love by choice.
love_quotes.chinese: 墜入情網靠緣份，堅守愛情靠抉擇。

love_quotes.english: When I'm alone I feel like I can do so little. But when we are together our love can accomplish so much.
love_quotes.chinese: 當我一個人時，我感覺能做的很少，但當我們一起時，我們的愛能完成好多。

love_quotes.english: When you feel alone, just look at the spaces between your fingers, and remember that's where my fingers fit perfectly.
love_quotes.chinese: 當你感到孤獨時，就看向你指間的縫隙，記得那就是我手指最合適的位置。

love_quotes.english: When you need someone to listen, I'll be there. When you need a hug, I'll be there. When you need someone to hold your hand, I'll be there. When you need someone to wipe your tears, guess what? I'll be there.
love_quotes.chinese: 當你需要有人傾聽時，我就在這裡；當你需要溫暖的懷抱時，我就在這裡；當你需要有人牽你的手時，我就在這裡。當你需要有人為你擦去傷心的淚水時，你知道嗎？我就在這裡。

love_quotes.english: Wherever you go, whatever you do, I will be right here waiting for you.
love_quotes.chinese: 無論你身在何處，無論你為何忙碌，我都會在此為你守候。

love_quotes.english: With the wonder of your love, the sun above always shines.
love_quotes.chinese: 擁有你美麗的愛情，太陽就永遠明媚。

love_quotes.english: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
love_quotes.chinese: 你愛上某個人不是因為他的長相、穿著，又或者是他高貴的車，而是因為他唱了一首只有你聽得見的歌。

love_quotes.english: Your love turns the dust of everyday life into sparkles and glitter.
love_quotes.chinese: 你的愛能將日常生活的塵土變得閃耀動人。

love_quotes.english: Your smiling at me is my daily dose of magic.
love_quotes.chinese: 你嫣然的微笑是我每日的魔法劑量。

love_quotes.english: You're the first one I think of when I wake up and last one I think of before I go to sleep.
love_quotes.chinese: 我起床時第一個會想到的人和就寢前最後一個會想到的人，就是你。
